plugin-data.name: Yandex Tools
plugin-data.description: This plugin generate the meta tag to validate your site with Yandex Webmasters Tools and the JavaScript code to track with Yandex.Metrika.

complete-this-field-with-the-yandex-veri: Complete this field with the Yandex Site verification code to verify the site owner.
complete-this-field-with-the-yametrika-i: Complete this field with the Counter ID to generate the Javascript tracking code for Yandex.Metrika.
